name: Mining Kart
description:
I'm very excited on publish this game.

It's the first time I try the Ludum Dare game jam so I am a little bit nervous.

The theme was "deeper and deeper" so I took the idea of a mine, but wanted to make something a little bit different than someone digging.

This game is and endless runner similar to Subway Surfers, you are a mine wagon and you must get as far as possible collecting all the diamonds you can.

The controls are simple: "A"  = move to the left and "D" = move to the right. If you collide with an obstacle the run ends and you must start from the beggining. Also you can end the run by clicking the button "escape". 

The game has been made in Unity.

The art for the game was made by Ulises Lafuente (twitter acc: @RataUnderground) and I took the different sounds from the unity asset store: the sound effects for collisions belongs to the package "Fantasy Menu SFX" and the main theme of the game belongs to "Seamless Loop and Short Music".

Thank you so much, hope you enjoy the game  : )
